CnlType.Name: Calculated real
CnlType.Descr: Real value of a channel is calculated using the formula

CnlType.Name: Minute real
CnlType.Descr: Real value of a channel is calculated using the formula once in every minute

CnlType.Name: Hourly real
CnlType.Descr: Real value of a channel is calculated using the formula once in every hour

CnlType.Name: Switching counter
CnlType.Descr: Switching counter. Counts transitions over 0 of a value calculated using the formula

CnlType.Name: Calculated discrete
CnlType.Descr: Discrete value of a channel is calculated using the formula

CnlType.Name: Minute discrete
CnlType.Descr: Discrete value of a channel is calculated using the formula once in every minute

CnlType.Name: Hourly discrete
CnlType.Descr: Discrete value of a channel is calculated using the formula once in every hour
